Judul: The Sites and Sounds of Placemaking: Branding, Festivalization, and the Contemporary City
Abstrak: The article investigates the extent to which branded imagery actually affects the lived experiences of those who utilize urban spaces which play host to festivals in the U.S. Topics discussed include the link between "production of space" and "production of symbols" and the emergence of hospitality and entertainment facilities in spaces that were previously occupied by manufacturing industries. The experiences of those who took part in three major music festivals are mentioned.
Sumber: Journal of Popular Music Studies (Wiley-Blackwell). Jun2016, Vol. 28 Issue 2, p204-223. 20p
